aircraft.value: Thunderhawk X-12 - AC-2879-721 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Flight management system database corruption. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 13/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 15/10/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/10/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 19/10/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 21/10/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
